subtitle: Only a few ingredients are used but they are turned into a very tasty dish.

method.text: Heat butter and oil in large frying pan. Gently fry onion and garlic until lightly browned.
Add potatoes and fry on both sides until browned. Cover and cook for 10-12 min until potatoes are tender.
Season to taste. Sprinkle over the cheese and parsley. Stir gently until melted. Serve piping hot.

title: Lancashire potato galette
